summary: "A Series of Unfortunate Events" is a 13-book series by Lemony Snicket (real name Daniel Handler). It tells the story of Violet, Klaus, and Sunny Baudelaire, orphans who face many challenges after their parents die. Their guardian, Count Olaf, tries to steal their money and causes trouble. The books are funny but dark, with old-fashioned feelings and unusual details. They're famous for their clever writing and have been made into a movie, game, and TV show. Over 60 million copies have been sold worldwide.
title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
